titles.title: Recognizing and commending Viola Liuzzo for her extraordinary courage and for her contribution to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committee.subcommittee: Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
committee.name: House Judiciary

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/24/2010--Introduced. Recognizes Viola Liuzzo for her extraordinary courage and for her contribution to ensuring that the United States is a nation with liberty and justice for all.
